titleStmt.title: Strange and miraculous news from St. Omers being an account of the wonderful life and death of a popish saint and martyr named Mr. Edmund Gennings, priest who was executed for treason some years since : with a relation of the miracles at and after his death : wherein may be observed what lying wonders the credulous papists are made to believe, both against sense and reason.

notesStmt.note: "Published by their own copy which was printed by authority at St. Omers."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
